sentences.en: The far-off faint crying went on and led her.
sentences.cn: 远处传来微弱的哭声，把她引了过去。

sentences.en: There was a sound like the faintest, far-off shout.
sentences.cn: 远处传来一阵模糊不清的喊叫声。

sentences.en: The band was playing far off in their blue and yellow uniforms.
sentences.cn: 这个乐队身着蓝黄相间的制服正在远处演奏。
